resources.string: On buzzer, timer starts and all plates light up. After hitting the last plate timer will stop.
On buzzer, timer starts and a randomly selected plate lights up. After hitting the plate and new randomly selected plate will light up until selected number of targets have been hit.

On buzzer, timer starts and a randomly selected plate lights up. Plate must be hit within timeout limit or game ends. If plate is hit in time and new randomly selected plate will light up until selected number of targets have been hit. Next round will have a shorter time out period.
On buzzer, timer starts and all plates light up. Plates must be hit a randomly selected amount of times before they will stay off. Once all plates are extingushed timer will stop.

On buzzer, count down timer starts and a randomly selected plate lights up. Plates only stay lit for time out period. Once plate goes out, either hit or timed out, and new randomly selected plate will light up until round time is up. Next round will have shorter timeout period. If there are no hits in a round game ends.
After buzzer, after player hits first plate timer will start. Plates light briefly when hit to show contact. Player can hit any plate as many times as they want. Round ends when player presses stop.
